languages.text: "Оправданное решение. Все познания, что прежде охранялись обетами и клятвами, стали в их руках орудием Архиврага. Это измена".
"A reasonable decision. All the knowledge that was previously guarded by their vows and oaths has now become a tool of the Archenemy. It is treason."
languages.original_text: "Оправданное решение. Все познания, что прежде охранялись обетами и клятвами, стали в их руках орудием Архиврага. Это измена".

traits.locale_text: "A reasonable decision. All the knowledge that was previously guarded by their vows and oaths has now become a tool of the Archenemy. It is treason."
"A reasonable decision. All the knowledge that was previously guarded by their vows and oaths has now become a tool of the Archenemy. It is treason."
"A reasonable decision. All the knowledge that was previously guarded by their vows and oaths has now become a tool of the Archenemy. It is treason."
"A reasonable decision. All the knowledge that was previously guarded by their vows and oaths has now become a tool of the Archenemy. It is treason."

languages.text: “这是个合情合理的决定。那些他们曾宣誓保护的知识，如今都变成了混沌大敌的工具，这就是叛国行为。”
languages.original_text: "A reasonable decision. All the knowledge that was previously guarded by their vows and oaths has now become a tool of the Archenemy. It is treason."

traits.locale_text: “这是个合情合理的决定。那些他们曾宣誓保护的知识，如今都变成了混沌大敌的工具，这就是叛国行为。”

languages.text: « Une décision on ne peut plus raisonnable. Toutes les connaissances qu'ils avaient juré de protéger sont désormais entre les mains du Grand Ennemi. C'est de la trahison pure et simple. »
languages.original_text: "A reasonable decision. All the knowledge that was previously guarded by their vows and oaths has now become a tool of the Archenemy. It is treason."

traits.locale_text: « Une décision on ne peut plus raisonnable. Toutes les connaissances qu'ils avaient juré de protéger sont désormais entre les mains du Grand Ennemi. C'est de la trahison pure et simple. »

languages.text: «Una decisión razonable. Todo el conocimiento que protegían sus votos y juramentos ahora está al servicio del Archienemigo. Es traición».
languages.original_text: "A reasonable decision. All the knowledge that was previously guarded by their vows and oaths has now become a tool of the Archenemy. It is treason."

traits.locale_text: «Una decisión razonable. Todo el conocimiento que protegían sus votos y juramentos ahora está al servicio del Archienemigo. Es traición».

languages.text: 「合理的判断だ。以前は誓いで守られていたすべてが、今となっては渾沌の勢力の道具となった。これは反逆だ」
languages.original_text: "A reasonable decision. All the knowledge that was previously guarded by their vows and oaths has now become a tool of the Archenemy. It is treason."

traits.locale_text: 「合理的判断だ。以前は誓いで守られていたすべてが、今となっては渾沌の勢力の道具となった。これは反逆だ」

languages.text: "Eine vernünftige Entscheidung. All das Wissen, das zuvor von ihren Schwüren und Gelübden beschützt wurde, ist nun zum Werkzeug des Erzfeinds geworden. Das ist Hochverrat."
languages.original_text: "A reasonable decision. All the knowledge that was previously guarded by their vows and oaths has now become a tool of the Archenemy. It is treason."

traits.locale_text: "Eine vernünftige Entscheidung. All das Wissen, das zuvor von ihren Schwüren und Gelübden beschützt wurde, ist nun zum Werkzeug des Erzfeinds geworden. Das ist Hochverrat."

languages.original_text: "A reasonable decision. All the knowledge that was previously guarded by their vows and oaths has now become a tool of the Archenemy. It is treason."

languages.text: "Makul bir karar. Ettikleri yeminlerce korunan tüm bilgiler, Şerbaşı'nın elinde bize karşı kullanılacak. Bu ihanettir."
languages.original_text: "A reasonable decision. All the knowledge that was previously guarded by their vows and oaths has now become a tool of the Archenemy. It is treason."

traits.locale_text: "Makul bir karar. Ettikleri yeminlerce korunan tüm bilgiler, Şerbaşı'nın elinde bize karşı kullanılacak. Bu ihanettir."
